refnamediv.refpurpose: Save NTFS-ACLs in a tdb file

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This VFS module is part of the samba 7 suite.
The vfs_acl_tdb VFS module stores NTFS Access Control Lists (ACLs) in a tdb file. This enables the full mapping of Windows ACLs on Samba servers.
The ACL settings are stored in $LOCKDIR/file_ntacls.tdb.
Please note that this module is experimental!

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: There are no options for vfs_acl_tdb.

refsect1.title: AUTHOR
refsect1.para: The original Samba software and related utilities were created by Andrew Tridgell. Samba is now developed by the Samba Team as an Open Source project similar to the way the Linux kernel is developed.
